attributes.action: Safeguarding all WW1 & WW2 War Memorials
attributes.additional_details:
I'm petitioning for all WW1 & WW2 War Memorials to be 'Listed' like historic or noteworthy buildings are.

These memorials commemorate those who answered their country's call and as such should be safeguarded against removal or damage through building renovations/demolition, road widening etc.
